com.jswiff.hl.factories
Class WAVDocumentFactory

extends java.lang.Object

Creates a document including an uncompressed wav sound file.

Constructor Detail

WAVDocumentFactory

public WAVDocumentFactory(javax.sound.sampled.AudioInputStream audioInputStream)
                   throws java.io.IOException

Creates a new WAVDocumentFactory instance. The passed AudioInputStream is converted to a linear PCM WAV (so you may be able to use other formats like .au). Sample rates of 5512, 11025, 22050 and 44100 Hz are supported.

Note: you can use the following to get an AudioInputStream:

AudioInputStream audioInputStream = AudioSystem.getAudioInputStream((bufferedInputStream));

Parameters:
audioInputStream - audio input stream
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if something went wrong while reading from the audio stream

WAVDocumentFactory

public WAVDocumentFactory(java.io.InputStream wavStream)
Creates a new WAVDocumentFactory instance. Sample rates of 5512, 11025, 22050 and 44100 kHz are supported.

Parameters:
wavStream - WAV input stream

altered stream

                        throws java.io.IOException
Returns the created document.

Returns:
SWF doc

main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
                 throws java.io.IOException,
                        javax.sound.sampled.UnsupportedAudioFileException
Main method for quick tests, pass input file (wav) and output file (swf).

Parameters:
args - wav, swf files
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occured
